title: Future of on-premise data management w/ DataStax Enterprise 6.9 & Hyper-Converged Data Platform
description:
Discover how DataStax Enterprise (DSE) 6.9 enhances the performance, scalability, and security of enterprise AI workloads and real-time data processing. Learn about the new features and improvements that make it easier to manage complex data environments while ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.

We introduce the DataStax Hyper-Converged Data Platform (HCDP), a unified solution that seamlessly integrates multiple data models and workloads within a single platform. This innovation simplifies architecture, reduces operational costs, and accelerates time-to-value for all of your data initiatives.

Key Takeaways:
--Comprehensive overview of DSE 6.9's new features and enhancements.
--Insight into the benefits of the HCDP for modern data management.
--Learn why you should upgrade to DSE 6.9 and/or HCDP.
--Discover how to drive business value from the generative AI and vector search capabilities of DSE 6.9 and HCDP.

RESOURCES:
HCDP Blog: https://bit.ly/45xo0kj 
Demo App: https://bit.ly/4bbgNrB
DSE 6.9 Download: https://bit.ly/3VmEA1C
Contact us to learn more: https://bit.ly/3Rxg0KD


About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache CassandraÂ©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
